comments.content:
Hi Scott,

here are some ransom note fonts (no match):

[House Vandalism](http://web.archive.org/web/20090626150317/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/flyerfonts/viewfonts)  
 [Blackmail (2Rebels)](http://web.archive.org/web/20090626150317/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/2rebels/blackmail_regular/)  
 [Archive Type Mix 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20090626150317/http:/blogs.graphicdesignforum.com/chrisd/2007/01/free-fonts-that-3.html)  
 [Ransom Threat](http://web.archive.org/web/20090626150317/http:/grilledcheese.com/c/fonts.pl/fname=ransom/)  
 [Drunken Hour](http://web.archive.org/web/20090626150317/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/pizzadude/drunken-hour/)  
 [Drunken Shower](http://web.archive.org/web/20090626150317/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/pizzadude/drunken-shower/)  
 [GF Blackmail](http://web.archive.org/web/20090626150317/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gigofonts/gf-blackmail/)  
 [Collage](http://web.archive.org/web/20090626150317/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/turtlearts/collage/)  
 [Ransom Note](http://web.archive.org/web/20090626150317/http:/masterstech-home.com/the_library/font_samples/Font_Indices/Image_Pages/R/RansomNote.html)

However, I recommend a pile of newpapers, scissors and glue!  
F

——  
 [Please use a descriptive title next time! Thank you.](http://web.archive.org/web/20090626150317/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2)
